e2e_details.entry_point: generateValidatedCase() for pipeline, solve() for solver
e2e_details.notes: CLI uses autosolve/tuner which call solve() — signal metrics display correctly

integration_points_verified.check: SignalType, SignalStrength, SignalAnalysis, SignalConfig all exported and consumed correctly
Called with (evidence, config), result drives injection decision, called again after injection
Flows through both legacy simulate() and blueprint simulateWithBlueprints()
Called once after evidence derivation, result included in all 6 post-evidence return paths
Injection adds event to mutable array, re-derivation picks it up, anti-anticlimax respected (adjacent room placement)
autosolve collects metrics from solve() results including signal availability

notes: Director (director.ts) does not use SignalConfig — this is by design (Out of Scope per task 004: 'Actual variety system implementation')
CLI single-seed verbose mode does not display signalAnalysis — this was a hint, not an AC. Signal metrics are available in autosolve and tuner modes.
sim_failed early return in solve() correctly omits signalAnalysis (no evidence exists to analyze)
